nodes.bodyText: add a direct test for this
make all processors and use the order annotation to control dependencies.
stream must be closed with resource at the time it is created.
return a stream or close on any type of failure.

commit.message: PLFM-6057: Added tests storage location string sanitize
PLFM-6057: Moved base key and bucket owner to their own processor
PLFM-6057: Make sure to avoid connection leaks on bucket object reads

afterCommit.message: PLFM-6057: Make sure to avoid connection leaks on bucket object reads
